data.name: The Ditzy Demons Are in Love With Me Fandisc - Theme Songs
data.detailed_description: Single containing the opening and ending themes for The Ditzy Demons Are in Love With Me - Fandisc! Contains 4 tracks including a remix of the opening to The Ditzy Demons Are in Love With Me Opening theme by SHOT MUSIC. Contains MP3 and FLAC versions as well as English lyrics.
